queryMap.query: -- 장비 정비이력 정비 유형 등록 INSERT INTO TBEF_EQUIP_REPR_TPE_HIS ( STND_YEAR, REPR_SEQ, REPR_TPE_CD ) VALUES ( ?, DECODE(?, NULL, (SELECT NVL(MAX(TP.REPR_SEQ),0) REPR_SEQ FROM TBEF_EQUIP_REPR_HIS TP WHERE TP.STND_YEAR = ? ), ?), ?)

-- 장비 정비이력 정비 유형 삭제 DELETE FROM TBEF_EQUIP_REPR_TPE_HIS WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND REPR_SEQ = DECODE(?, NULL, (SELECT NVL(MAX(TP.REPR_SEQ),0) REPR_SEQ FROM TBEF_EQUIP_REPR_HIS TP WHERE TP.STND_YEAR = ? ), ?)
